app_guideline.dashboard_add_training_desc: Click here to add more modules to your learning menu.
app_guideline.dashboard_intro_desc: Let's learn how the Quizrr app works!
app_guideline.dashboard_profile_desc: Access and edit your profile information such as your language choice.
app_guideline.dashboard_start_training_desc: Select the first module to get started.
app_guideline.dashboard_surveys_desc: Click one module to access your survey questions.
app_guideline.dashboard_surveys_title: These are the surveys selected for you.
app_guideline.dashboard_training_coins_desc: The more you learn, the more you earn!
app_guideline.dashboard_training_time_played_desc: The time you have invested in gaining knowledge.
app_guideline.dashboard_trainings_completed_desc: Keep track of the number of learning modules you have completed.
app_guideline.dashboard_trainings_desc: Here are the modules in your learning program.

baseline.intro: Almost there! Let's see what you know about this topic. If you don't know the answer, please choose "Not sure, but I want to learn more". After these initial questions, the learning module will start.
baseline.verify_quit: You are about to quit the learning module. Are you sure you want to?

branding.text: This learning program is brought to you by

confirm_change_factory.question: You are switching to a new workplace, which will **delete your data**. Are you sure you want to continue?
confirm_change_factory.title: Workplace change alert!

confirm_factory.question: Do you still work at **{{factoryName}}**?
confirm_factory.title: Just checking-in
confirm_factory.verify_question: This might make changes to your app. Are you sure that you no longer work at **{{factoryName}}**?
confirm_factory.verify_question_user: These changes might cause the loss of any ongoing sessions. Are you sure you want to edit your user details?

danger_zone.delete_account_confirmation: You will not be able to recover your profile, or any information on it once you delete your profile. Are you sure you want to proceed?
danger_zone.delete_account_deleted_request_success: Your account deletion request has been sent. We are processing it. You will now be logged out.
danger_zone.delete_account_send_request_error: Sorry, an error occurred. Please try again.
danger_zone.delete_data_description: Are you sure you want to delete all data? This action can't be undone.
danger_zone.logout_confirmation: This will remove your profile and any ongoing session from the app. Are you sure?
danger_zone.logout_description: Remove your profile and any ongoing session from the app.
danger_zone.reset_data_description: Once you reset data, there is no going back. Please be certain.
danger_zone.title: Danger Zone
danger_zone.toggle_sandbox_description: This will turn off sandbox mode, and all data generated will be stored in the production database. Please be certain before turning off sandbox mode.

dashboard.learning_modules_taken_in_order: The learning modules should be played in order.

game.discard_and_quit: You are about to quit the learning program. Your ongoing sessions will be removed. Are you sure?
game.post_training_survey_instruction: Almost done! Please take the following survey to help us improve. Your feedback is appreciated.
game.resume: Your last ongoing learning module has been resumed. You can either quit the module or continue playing.
game.verify_quit: You are about to quit the learning module. Are you sure you want to?

game_complete.entire_training_completed: You have completed the full learning program.
game_complete.subtitle: You have completed
game_complete.title: CONGRATULATIONS

group_training.how_many_members: How many of you are learning together?
group_training.only_individual_can_take_survey: You're taking a survey, only individual is allowed.
group_training.registration_invalid_input: Some of your input are invalid. Please go through the form for details.
group_training.title: Group Learning

indexed_db_error.generic: Sorry, an error occurred. Please try again.
indexed_db_error.retrying: Hang in there, saving your data is taking a bit longer than expected...
indexed_db_error.session_creation: Sorry, there was an error starting the module. Please try again.

moved_import_training.scan_qr_code_title: Scan or upload QR code to get started.
moved_import_training.workplace_confirmation_description: Please make sure that this workplace you have selected is correct.

movie.app_offline: The app is currently offline. To watch the videos, please ensure that you're connected to the internet.
movie.show_videos_off:
Videos are disabled in your app at this time. You can change this by going to your **Profile tab** and turning on the **Training Videos** under **Settings**. 

To continue playing without videos, close this message.

onboarding_download_progress.instruction: Please wait while we download the needed materials. If there is any failed downloads please retry.
onboarding_download_progress.title: Download Progress

onboarding_select_training_mode.instruction: Please choose between: download materials needed for offline learning, or continue with online learning.
onboarding_select_training_mode.title: Download Learning Materials

player_setup.account_number_has_been_used: Account number has been previously used
player_setup.account_number_stored: Your learning code will be remembered on this device.
player_setup.can_not_access_learning_module: You can't train with {{module}}, it is for {{exclusiveTo}} only.
player_setup.country_description: Please select the country that you were recruited from.
player_setup.date_of_birth_description: Please select your day, month, and year of birth
player_setup.do_you_have_account_number: Do you have a learning code?
player_setup.do_you_have_account_number_description: Your learning code is an anonymous and unique number that is assigned the first time you train with Quizrr.
player_setup.do_you_have_account_number_description_e: If you don't have a learning code, or if you've never trained with Quizrr before, please select the option "I do not have a learning code".
player_setup.employment_status_description: Please select your current employment status.
player_setup.enter_account_number_instruction: Please enter your learning code to access your existing profile and learning modules.
player_setup.error_id_format: Your ID number seems to be in the wrong format.
player_setup.error_id_old: The date is more than 100 years ago.
player_setup.error_id_young: The date is less than 10 years ago.
player_setup.error_invalid_date: This does not seem to be a valid date.
player_setup.get_learning_code: I don't have a learning code.
player_setup.have_account_number: I already have a learning code.
player_setup.id_description: Please enter your date of birth, followed by the last 4 digits of your personal ID **(YYYYMMDD-NNNN)**
player_setup.id_description_1: Please enter the last 4 characters of your employee ID.
player_setup.id_description_3: Please enter the last 4 digits of your mobile phone number.
player_setup.id_description_4: Please enter your employee ID number.
player_setup.id_description_5: Please enter the last 4 digits of your employee ID.
player_setup.id_description_6: Please enter the last 3 digits of your employee ID.
player_setup.id_description_7: Please enter the last 4 digits of your national ID number.
player_setup.id_description_8: Please enter the 4 digits from your employee ID.
player_setup.invalid_input: Some of your inputs are invalid. Please see the form for details.
player_setup.job_level_description: Please select your position at work.
player_setup.labor_agent_employed_by: Do you work at a labor agency?
player_setup.missing_account_number: I don't have a learning code.
player_setup.missing_account_number_instruction: At the end of the profile registration, you will be assigned a learning code.
player_setup.post_arrival_agent_description: Please select your labor agent in the country you are currently working in.
player_setup.pre_departure_agent_description: Please select your labor agent in your home country, before your departure.
player_setup.privacy_consent: By clicking the below button, you agree to accept our privacy policy and Terms & Conditions and proceed.
player_setup.privacy_info: The next step is for you to log in.
player_setup.region_description: Please select the region you come from.
player_setup.retail_store_description: Please select the retail store where you currently work.
player_setup.save_account_number_instruction: Please save this number to access your profile so you can keep track of your learning progress and avoid starting over on other devices.
player_setup.sector_description: Please select the sector or industry you currently work in or are looking for a job in.
player_setup.sub_sector_description: Please select the specific sector you work in.
player_setup.supplier_category_description: Please select your supplier/service category at work
player_setup.title: Please enter your information.
player_setup.verification_failed: Thanks for inputting your learning code. We will now ask for your information again. Please click on the arrow to continue.

post_training.i_learned_something_new: I learned something new from this training module.

privacy.data_collection_new: We collect some details about you to help create more learning modules for the future. Your privacy is important to us, and your individual data will never be shared.
privacy.info_text: By using this app, you accept our Terms & Conditions at [www.quizrr.se/terms-of-conditions-and-use](https://www.quizrr.se/terms-of-conditions-and-use). When you use the app, we collect the personal data you share, as well as device and training information, to deliver and improve our services, including create and share aggregated statistics with customers and partner. Please note that your individual results are not disclosed to anyone outside of Quizrr and the processors we use. Read the full Privacy notice at [www.quizrr.se/privacy-policy](https://www.quizrr.se/privacy-policy) and contact [info@quizrr.se](mailto:info@quizrr.se) if you have any questions about your privacy and our use of your personal data.

profile.get_support_text: To get support on urgent issues, click here to send us an email.
profile.offline_training_desc: For offline learning, click here to download the material.
profile.privacy_description: Click here to access privacy information.
profile.settings_autoplay_description: Turn this feature off if you prefer the next question to not open automatically.
profile.settings_show_videos_description: Turn this feature off to train without videos. Best suited for learning in a classroom setting or for a quick review.
profile.title: Profile
profile.video_library_description: Click here to access all downloaded videos.

question.response_correct_first: Correct answer on the first try!

verify_group.title: Is this your group?
